text: Adoor is the city in Pathanamthitta, Kerala, and may also refer to: * Adoor Gopalakrishnan, Indian film director * Adoor Bhasi, Indian actor * Adoor Bhavani, Indian actress * Adoor Pankajam, Indian actress * Adoor (Lok Sabha constituency), a constituency in Kerala * Adoor Prakash, Indian politician * Adoor (Yelbarga), a village in India * Adoor Palam, a village in India
title: Adoor (disambiguation)
